column1: Bilsanda is a town and nagar panchayat in the Pilibhit district of Uttar Pradesh
Bilsanda is located at 28.25°N 79.95°E﻿ / 28.25; 79.95. It has an average elevation of 161 metres (528 feet).
As of the 2001 Census of India
column3: 474. Males constitute 53% of the population and females 47%. Bilsanda has an average literacy rate of 54%
column4: lower than the national average of 59.5%; with male literacy of 60% and female literacy of 47%. 16% of the population is under 6 years of age.
